column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I was never a fan of deep dish pizza
column2: I didn't really like Zachary's in Berkeley
column3: and the first time I tired deep dish in Chicago
column4: I didn't enjoy it much either. We were with some local Chicago friends
column5: and they suggested Manalti's as the best deep dish pizza in Chicago for the buttery crust
column6: so we decided to go. Right when we got seated
column7: I realized that I've been here before. This was my second time at a Manalti chain pizza restaurant in the area
column8: and since deep dish is not a personal favorite of mine
column9: come here if you love lots of cheese and buttery crunchy crust. Great atmosphere too with decorations of different sports memorabilia hanging on the walls
column10: and they are not shy on refillable drinks - they are a monster of a size.
